title: Tanks, cannons, soldiers sleeping in DC offices: Trump's parade plans
shortDescription: For Trump's historic military parade, soldiers' chow will consist of two Meals Ready to Eat and one hot meal a day. Bring your sleeping bags, said one official.

title: Why red states are joining Trump fight to 'root out DEI'
shortDescription: A wave of legislation targeting diversity, equity and inclusion is rolling through Republican-controlled statehouses. Here's why.

title: Ben Cohen kicked out of Senate hearing
shortDescription: Capitol Police was directed to physically remove protesters from a Senate hearing, including Ben Cohen of Ben & Jerry's.

title: How Air Force One stacks up to Trump's coveted 'palace in the sky'
shortDescription: President Donald Trump says Air Force One isn't as impressive as some of the planes of the leaders of Qater, Saudi Arabia and United Arab Emirates.

title: House GOP advances bill to spend $5 billion on private school vouchers
shortDescription: House Republicans backed President Trump's private school-voucher agenda when the House Ways and Means Committee approved a budget proposal on May 14

title: Supreme Court takes up birthright citizenship: major Trump case explained
shortDescription: The Supreme Court is considering whether Trump's executive order ending birthright citizenship can be enforced while it's challenged in court.

title: Trump announces Boeing deal days as Qatar plans to gift him 747
shortDescription: President Donald Trump's trip to Qatar was all about airplanes – whether he was buying or accepting.

title: In new book, allegations of Biden's mental decline described
shortDescription: Biden’s mental fitness and age were a concern for voters before he dropped out of the 2024 presidential race.

title: Trump denies talking Trump family business in Saudi Arabia
shortDescription: Trump's family has forged multi-billion dollar business deals in the Gulf.

title: Some House members snooze during markup of Trump budget bill
shortDescription: While in late night mark-up sessions, at least two members of the House of Representatives dozed off asleep.

title: Jets, chandeliers, a Cybertruck: See Trump's Middle East reception
shortDescription: From lavender carpets and fighter jets, to camels and a Cybertruck in Doha, here are the sights of Trump's Middle East visit.

title: RFK Jr. skirts divisive question at congressional hearing
shortDescription: Rep. Mark Pocan asked Health Secretary Robert F. Kennedy Jr. about a divisive issue. His response? Americans should not take medical advice from him.

title: 'Perfecto': Wealthy Gulf rulers pour on the charm for Trump
shortDescription: President Trump is touring three of the Middle East's wealthiest monarchies. They are giving him a reception fit for an admirer of kings.

title: Qatar welcomes President Trump with opulence
shortDescription: President Donald Trump touched down in Doha, Qatar to a more-than-warm welcome of fighter jets, Cybertrucks, and dancers.

title: House Speaker Mike Johnson backs congressional stock trading ban
shortDescription: Johnson's support may mean the long-awaited legislation may finally have a chance on Capitol Hill.
